author.description: Digital artist, curator, former VJ. I make art with old computers and video games since 2005. https://linktr.ee/vjentter

text:
THESE INSTITUTIONS HAS THE MOST POLITICAL INFLUENCE: A.▢TELEVISION B.▢THE CHURCH C.▢SAMO D.▢MC DONALDS
